thread.title: BRIEF--Walgreen to pay $5.5 mln to settle Massachusetts drug overcharge probe

title: BRIEF--Walgreen to pay $5.5 mln to settle Massachusetts drug overcharge probe
text: March 20, 2018 / 2:29 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF--Walgreen to pay $5.5 mln to settle Massachusetts drug overcharge probe Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Massachsuetts says walgreens to pay $5.5 million over alleged overcharges for prescription drugs Massachusetts attorney general says walgreens overcharged for drugs covered by the state workersâ€™ compensation insurance system Massachusetts says walgreens violated state laws from 2008 and 2017; says chain will implement procedures to prevent future overcharges on opioids, other drugs
